channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Taxpayers and tech companies will help fund journalism and AI research in landmark California deal
item.description: The initiatives are set to kick in in 2025 with $100 million the first year, and the majority of the money would go to news organizations.

item.title: What a Harris election victory could mean for Europe and the transatlantic relationship
item.description: Analysts at the Economist Intelligence Unit said they expect the substance of Harris' position on major international issues to be similar to that of ...

item.title: In many betting markets, Trump now holds small lead over Harris
German Shell whistleblower says Chinese emission reduction oilfield was actually a chicken farm
item.description: Dozens of carbon reduction schemes in China are alleged to be fake, leaving Germany with a potential $5 billion fraud case.

item.title: Thursday's analyst calls: Bullish ahead of Nvidia earnings, beauty stock upgraded
item.description: A chipmaker and a beauty stock were among the stocks being talked about by analysts on the Street.

item.title: All rail traffic in Canada and shipments crossing the U.S. border have stopped
Nvidia’s Jensen Huang sells $14 million in stock almost daily—raising questions about his successor
item.description: "Stop giving him stock. He's clearly got too much and that's why he's getting rid of it."

item.title: Body of British tech entrepreneur Mike Lynch retrieved from Sicily yacht wreckage
item.description: Lynch was one of 22 passengers aboard the Bayesian superyacht, which capsized while anchored off the coast of Sicily.

item.title: Tim Walz promises middle-class tax cuts and help for homebuyers in DNC speech
This $1,700 cult bassinet just added a $20 monthly subscription—and parents are fuming
item.description: Happiest Baby introduced a new subscription model for its polarizing smart bassinet.

item.title: Bavarian Nordic shares pop over 11% after earnings beat; bumper mpox vaccine order
item.description: Shares of Danish biotech company Bavarian Nordic jumped in early deals Thursday after reporting first-half earnings and a bumper mpox vaccine order.

item.title: Harris backs Biden’s tax proposals — including tax on unrealized capital gains
The future could be bright for Irish wine as long as climate change warms up its cool climate
item.description: So far Ireland has been shielded from dramatic impacts of climate change like wildfires, drought and death, helping its nascent wine industry.

item.title: Poet Amanda Gorman's new poem celebrates democracy and unity
item.description: Amanda Gorman, a Harvard graduate, recited a poem at President Joe Biden's 2021 inauguration, making her the youngest inaugural poet.

item.title: Bronfman boosts last-minute offer for National Amusements and Paramount: WSJ
